EmailTemplate.subject: The DNA of Modern Cloud Applications
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Organisations looking to take advantage of cloud-native approaches to drive agile software development require a platform that automates and integrates the concepts of DevOps, continuous delivery, microservices and containers.
Learn the features essential for agile software development:
Infographic: 5 Tips for Building Engaging, Data-Driven Mobile Apps: https://content.pivotal.io/infographics/5-tips-for-building-engaging-data-driven-mobile-apps-infographic Users demand engaging, high-performance mobile app experiences. Read the 5 tips from Gartner for building data-driven mobile applications.
eBook: Beyond the 12 Factor App - Exploring the DNA of Highly Scalable, Resilient Cloud Applications: https://connect.pivotal.io/rs/625-IUJ-009/images/ebook-beyond-the-12-factor-app.pdf This eBook analyses cloud pioneer Heroku's twelve-factor app model; a set of rules and guidelines for helping organisations build cloud-native applications, applying today's new approaches and their impact on the framework.
I trust these insights will help you make transformation real for your organisation.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
